https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pVufH2ZVhWcoptJiXNFdEQKKalk.jpg When Gus Bazooka built his gym he never imagined that his sons, Angus and Judah, would someday battle for control. However, after Gus' untimely death (caused by watching a topless racquetball game) the future of the business becomes uncertain and the brothers make a wager to see who will take sole ownership of the gym. Bazookas: The Movie
